text: Antony Audenshaw (born Antony Lee; 13 January 1965) is an English actor and singer, best known for portraying the role of Bob Hope in the ITV soap opera Emmerdale (2000–present); he previously appeared in the programme in 1996. Audenshaw also portrayed PC Ian Coban in the Channel 4 soap opera Brookside (1994–1996). ==Other websites== * Category:1964 births Category:Living people Category:English television actors Category:English movie actors Category:English singers Category:Soap opera actors Category:Actors from Greater Manchester Category:Actors from Lancashire
title: Tony Audenshaw
